name: The Fallen (itch) (First Inversion)
description:
The Fallen is a short Star Wars fan game in which you play as an astromech trying to repair a ship that's taking damage set 3,956 years before the Battle of Yavin.

<Controls>

WASD to move

E to Repair

<Sections>

Bridge: Where cutscenes will happen in the future.

Left Weapons (LW): Fix the left weapons here.

Right Weapons (RW): Fix the right weapons here.

Turret: This is where AI will spawn in the future.

Engineering (EN): Fix the engine here.

<Release Notes>

Alpha v0.1 - This is a barebones version for the Star Wars Fan Game Jam

Alpha v0.2 - Fixed a bug relating to the intro not loading a video (by removing the intro).

Alpha v0.3 - Fixed the bug for real this time and put the intro back in.

NOTE: If the mouse bugs out in the pause menu press escape and it should fix itself.

<Coming Soon>

- AI that attacks the player

- Completed Computer Voice Overs

- Droid Movement Sounds

- Cutscenes
